original: I love playing Chopin.
translated: J'adore jouer du Chopin.

original: The cat's asleep.

original: It seems that he is rich.

original: It isn't easy to find the way to the park.

original: They understood.

original: Ziri pays.

original: My boss turned down his proposal.

original: You should read a lot of books while you're young.

original: You can see the colors of the spectrum in a rainbow.

original: Something just occurred to me.

original: He can imitate the rest of the family.

original: We have lunch at noon, usually.

original: Tom is convinced that his mother doesn't want to eat now.
translated: Tom est convaincu que sa mère ne veut pas manger maintenant.

original: I was astonished to hear what had happened.

original: I had met her many times before then.

original: Please clap.

original: I'm glad.

original: I don't like it when you cry.

original: Are you telling me the truth?

original: Believe it or not, she cannot even cook an egg.

original: That happened almost thirty years ago.

original: I'm not your wife.

original: I come from China.

original: I've always liked you.

original: The Internet, cell phones, or digitization... What effects will the technological evolution have on people's opinions, behavior, and political interests?
translated: Internet, téléphones portables ou numérisation... Quelles conséquences l'évolution technologique apporte-t-elle aux opinions, comportements et intérêts politiques des gens ?

original: The challenging boxer defeated the champion.
translated: Le boxeur challenger a vaincu le champion.

original: He finally accomplished the work.

original: Sami was often absent.

original: I've loved you since I first met you.

original: People who work in airports need to be able to switch languages very quickly.
translated: Les personnes qui travaillent dans les aéroports doivent être capables de passer d'une langue à l'autre très rapidement.

original: We are going to sleep.
translated: Nous allons nous coucher.

original: Sami goes to work during the day.
translated: Sami travaille le jour.

original: Tom always yells at Mary every time she does something stupid.

original: You are the ruler of your words, but, once said, they rule you.

original: I don't like it when mathematicians who know much more than I do can't express themselves explicitly.
translated: Je n'aime pas quand les mathématiciens qui en savent beaucoup plus que moi ne savent pas s'exprimer explicitement.

original: Break time's over.

original: The sink is broken.
translated: L'évier est cassé.

original: He was an indolent man, who lived only to eat, drink, and play at cards.
translated: C’était un homme indolent, qui ne vivait que pour manger, boire et jouer aux cartes.

original: Sit down with me.
translated: Assieds-toi avec moi.

original: The mere sight of a mosquito makes her sick.
translated: La simple vue d'un moustique la rend malade.

original: This book is well written.

original: Sami and Layla are newlyweds.
translated: Sami et Layla sont de jeunes mariés.

original: What exactly is that?

original: It would only be a waste of time.

original: You should go back there.

original: Change your clothes.

original: Dreams came true.

original: I didn't even know you had a horse.

original: You can't beat me at this game, faggot.

original: He said he would pay for the dinner.

original: I never imagined anything like this.

original: It should be better.

original: Tom loves you.

original: The examination is at hand.

original: Everyone helped each other out.
translated: Toutes s'aidaient l'une l'autre.

original: I have given myself to music.

original: Would she like that?

original: Is anybody there?

original: I've always played with my brother.

original: I promise you I'll help you.

original: The national debt is growing.

original: I don't think this is going to work, to be honest.

original: Exercise moderately.

original: Please write in a way that concretely conveys the question.

original: What did you buy her for Christmas?

translated: Je sentis quelqu'un me tapoter l'épaule derrière moi.

original: We were all concerned.

original: I'm sorry, I didn't hear you.

original: Beware of the dog!

translated: « Bon... » soupira Dima, qui se tourna alors vers le commerçant et lui lança un regard assassin. « Je crois que je n'ai pas le choix désormais... »

original: There's just something about him.

original: How did you come to hear of it?

original: I entered the bookstore on the way.

original: Was she able to write a report?

original: Have you been told when you are expected to be here?

original: I could feel the sand between my toes.

original: He said a few words by way of preface.

original: The rumor was without foundation.

original: That's my cat.

original: Tom knows better.

original: Do you have a lot to do?

original: I really like puppies.

original: The TV doesn't work.

original: What brings you here?

original: This house is fireproof.

original: That is a pencil.

original: I'm going to take a shower.

original: Tom is precise.

original: She's smarter than him.

original: Anything is possible.

original: I'm glad you invited me to your party.

original: I was there last night.

translated: L'extérieur doux et auto-réparateur de ce robot lui permettra de prendre des dégâts, de battre en retraite, puis de retourner au combat.

original: I transmitted the message to Tom.

original: Wear whatever you want.

original: What do you feel most proud of?

original: How will she cope?

original: She had to share a bedroom with her sister.
translated: Elle dut partager une chambre avec sa sœur.

original: He is the one who comes after me.

original: He's my best friend.

original: You'd be the one to know.

original: Why are you acting this way?

original: Be friendly.

original: Are you free?

original: You were helpful.

original: I know I am right.

original: She took my breath away.

original: The town is packed with tourists.

original: Language is the means by which people communicate with others.
translated: Le langage est le moyen par lequel les gens communiquent avec les autres.

original: Mary brought her son to work.

original: I feel like going to the movies.

original: I'm sick, and it's miserable!

original: If I were rich, I would travel a lot.

original: Biogas systems reduce methane emissions by transforming waste from livestock, crops, water and food into energy.
translated: Les installations de biogaz réduisent les émissions de méthane en transformant en énergie les déchets provenant du bétail, des cultures, de l'eau et de la nourriture.

original: Come on, let's go!

original: I know that Tom was early.

original: I understand it better than I speak it.

original: Nobody appreciates me.

original: The soup is too salty.
translated: La soupe est trop salée.

original: I'm lucky today.

original: You need to be more careful.

original: I still have another sister.

original: I won't attend the party.

original: Tom said goodnight.
translated: Tom a dit bonne nuit.

original: Can I count on your help?

original: Tom sees red.

original: We ate fresh fruit after dinner.
translated: Nous avons mangé des fruits frais après le déjeuner.

original: Sami deserves a little holiday.

original: He says the player was off the pitch.

original: His room is anything but neat.

original: His sudden death was a tragedy.

original: Poor men have no leisure.

original: I was naked.

original: You look just like your older brother.

original: I did my job.

original: You seem to be thinking of something else.

original: I feel like a nice hot bath.
translated: J'ai envie d'un bon bain chaud.

original: She's doing quite well.
translated: Elle s'en sort assez bien.

original: She had an abortion.
translated: Elle a eu un avortement.

translated: Dans une partie d'échecs, de nombreux mouvements tactiques sont basés sur la capacité des cavaliers d'attaquer simultanément deux pièces de l'adversaire.

original: He was given something to drink.

original: You just have to ask for it.

original: The reason is simple.
translated: La raison en est très simple.

original: Tom and Mary said they were mistaken.
translated: Tom et Marie ont dit qu'ils s'étaient trompés.

original: This microscope has a 100X magnification.

original: Car accidents are the leading cause of death for teenagers in the United States.
translated: Les accidents de voiture sont la cause principale de décès pour les adolescents aux États-Unis d'Amérique.

original: I made a lucky guess.

original: I don't want to forget it.

original: I had no clue.

original: There's a cat there.

original: I like the Occitan language.

original: What did you do yesterday?

original: I cannot say.
translated: Je ne peux pas le dire.

original: Please shut the door.
translated: Veuillez fermer la porte.

original: I was never told that.

original: The monk is in the monastery.

original: I don't know what you mean.

original: Understood in its totality, the spectacle is both the result and the goal of the dominant mode of production. It is not a mere decoration added to the real world. It is the very heart of this real society's unreality. In all of its particular manifestations — news, propaganda, advertising, entertainment — the spectacle represents the dominant model of life. It is the omnipresent affirmation of the choices that have already been made in the sphere of production and in the consumption implied by that production. In both form and content the spectacle serves as a total justification of the conditions and goals of the existing system. The spectacle also represents the constant presence of this justification since it monopolizes the majority of the time spent outside the production process.
translated: Le spectacle, compris dans sa totalité, est à la fois le résultat et le projet du mode de production existant. Il n'est pas un supplément au monde réel, sa décoration surajoutée. Il est le cœur de l'irréalisme de la société réelle. Sous toutes ses formes particulières, information ou propagande, publicité ou consommation directe de divertissements, le spectacle constitue le modèle présent de la vie socialement dominante. Il est l'affirmation omniprésente du choix déjà fait dans la production, et sa consommation corollaire. Forme et contenu du spectacle sont identiquement la justification totale des conditions et des fins du système existant. Le spectacle est aussi la présence permanente de cette justification, en tant qu'occupation de la part principale du temps vécu hors de la production moderne.

translated: Il a l'air d'un insecte.

original: I believe that consciousness is the way information feels when being processed.
translated: Je crois que la conscience est la façon dont l'information se sent lorsqu'elle est traitée.

original: I love all of you.
translated: Je vous aime toutes.

original: Women are not objects.
translated: Les femmes ne sont pas des objets.

original: I'm a Japanese teacher.
translated: Je suis enseignant en japonais.

original: It's mine.
translated: C'est à moi.

original: An elderly person was resting under a tree.
translated: Une personne âgée se reposait sous un arbre.

original: Many students work in part-time jobs.
translated: Beaucoup d'étudiants font des boulots à temps partiel.

original: It's cleaner.
translated: C'est plus propre.

original: He came near being run over by a car.
translated: Il était à deux doigts de se faire renverser par une voiture.

original: Why don't we just reformat the hard disk? You've been having a lot of trouble with it.
translated: Pourquoi ne pas ré-initialiser le disque dur ? Tu as eu plein de problèmes avec.

original: I paid.
translated: J’ai payé.

original: I was about to go out when the phone rang.
translated: J'allais sortir quand le téléphone a sonné.

original: Actions should have consequences.
translated: Les actions devraient avoir des conséquences.

original: Tom didn't want to go back to where he was born.
translated: Tom ne voulait pas retourner là où il était né.

original: Tom likes to dunk his biscuit in his coffee.
translated: Tom aime tremper son biscuit dans son café.

original: Which is heavier, lead or gold?
translated: Qu'est-ce qui est le plus lourd, le plomb ou l'or ?

original: I know that I'm crazy.
translated: Je sais que je suis fou.

original: They decided the date for the trip.
translated: Elles ont décidé de la date du voyage.

original: What's the name of the highest mountain in Germany?
translated: Quel est le nom de la plus haute montagne d'Allemagne ?

original: I would like to live in Brazil.
translated: J'aimerais vivre au Brésil.

original: It is time to shut the gate.
translated: Il est l'heure de fermer la porte.

original: There are no two words with an identical meaning.
translated: Il n'y a pas deux mots avec une signification identique.

original: He said that he was afraid it would be rainy.
translated: Il dit qu'il avait peur qu'il ne pleuve.

original: I sulk.
translated: Je boude.

original: Amnesia means "loss of memory".
translated: Amnésie signifie « perte de mémoire ».

original: The next day he went away.
translated: Le jour suivant il partit.

original: I've been threatened.
translated: J'ai été menacé.

original: I gave him all the money I had.
translated: Je lui ai donné tout l'argent que j'avais.

original: You look very pale.
translated: Vous avez l'air très pâles.

original: The post office is two miles from here.
translated: Le bureau de poste est à deux milles d'ici.

original: I want you to be my friend.
translated: Je veux que tu sois mon ami.

original: What are you suing Dan for?
translated: Pour quelles raisons portez-vous plainte contre Dan?

original: Why doesn't anyone believe me?
translated: Pourquoi personne ne me croit-il ?

original: If Tom needs help, we can give it to him.
translated: Si Tom a besoin d'aide, nous pouvons la lui offrir.

original: Tom forgot to file his taxes.
translated: Tom a oublié de déclarer ses impôts.

original: Will you be in Boston for Christmas?
translated: Seras-tu à Boston pour Noël ?

original: Doing that wouldn't be a good idea.
translated: Faire cela ne serait pas une bonne idée.

original: I may not get anything I asked for.
translated: Il se peut que je n'obtienne rien de ce que j'ai demandé.

original: She's only two years old, but she can already count to 100.
translated: Elle a seulement deux ans mais elle est capable de compter jusqu'à cent.

original: Tom left a large tip on the table.
translated: Tom a laissé un gros pourboire sur la table.

original: He walked away with a sad look on his face.
translated: Il s'en alla l'air triste.

original: This study grant was given to me by the departmental council.
translated: Cette bourse d'étude m'a été accordée par le conseil départemental.

original: Why all this skepticism?
translated: Pourquoi tout ce scepticisme ?

original: I'm skinny.
translated: Je suis maigrichonne.

original: Last night I tossed my cookies.
translated: La nuit dernière, j'ai vomi.

original: Stop right here.
translated: Arrête juste ici !

original: It was very beautiful.
translated: C'était fort beau.

original: They arrived in England a week ago.
translated: Ils sont arrivés en Angleterre il y a une semaine.

original: You run.
translated: Tu cours.

original: Eat slowly.
translated: Mange lentement.

original: I'd rather go for a walk.
translated: Je préférerais faire une promenade.

original: The batteries in my calculator are dead.
translated: Les piles de ma calculatrice sont à plat.

original: Sami downloaded the video for Layla.
translated: Sami a téléchargé la vidéo pour Layla.

original: Who had this idea?
translated: Qui a eu cette idée ?

original: Shit stinks.
translated: La merde pue.

original: This book will give you a clear idea of the American way of life.
translated: Ce livre te donnera une idée claire du mode de vie étasunien.

original: I'll grab it.
translated: Je mettrai la main dessus.

original: It's not a suitable topic for discussion.
translated: Ce n'est pas un sujet de débat convenable.

original: I was surprised by his perseverance.
translated: Je fus surpris par sa persévérance.

original: Let me know where you're staying.
translated: Faites-moi savoir où vous restez.

original: Look, I don't want to lose my job.
translated: Écoutez, je ne veux pas perdre mon boulot.

original: Ask her when she'll be back.
translated: Demande-lui quand elle reviendra.

original: Tom swam with the manatees.
translated: Tom nagea avec les lamantins.

original: You can't attend? Why not?
translated: Vous ne pouvez pas être présent ? Pourquoi pas ?

original: She never saw her again.
translated: Elle ne la revit jamais.

original: Never give up!
translated: N'abandonnez jamais !

original: I pushed Tom.
translated: J'ai poussé Tom.

original: It was in 1912 that the Titanic sank during her first voyage.
translated: C'est en 1912 que le Titanic a coulé lors de son premier voyage.

original: When did you finish it?
translated: Quand l'avez-vous terminé ?

original: Have you had lunch?
translated: As-tu pris un déjeuner ?

original: Tom will never stop needing our help.
translated: Tom n'arrêtera jamais d'avoir besoin de notre aide.

original: She is busy preparing for the trip.
translated: Elle est occupée à préparer le voyage.

original: They'll call.
translated: Elles appelleront.

original: He gave a short account of the accident.
translated: Il fit un bref compte rendu de l'accident.

original: That man is one cunning devil!
translated: C’est un homme rusé comme le diable !

original: I like stories that have sad endings.
translated: J'aime les histoires ayant une fin triste.

original: That is very expensive!
translated: C'est très onéreux !

original: She spoke impolitely.
translated: Elle parla impoliment.

original: She vanished.
translated: Elle disparut.

original: To make things even worse, he got sick.
translated: Pour comble de malheur, il tomba malade.

original: It's a difficult word to pronounce.
translated: C'est un mot difficile à prononcer.

original: I have to warn her.
translated: Il faut que je l'avertisse.

original: Tom's jokes are hilarious and get even better after he's had a few beers.
translated: Les blagues de Tom sont hilarantes et deviennent encore meilleures après qu'il ait bu quelques bières.

original: Here is a present for your birthday.
translated: Voici un cadeau pour ton anniversaire.

original: I know it's not what you suggested, but it was all I could do.
translated: Je sais que ce n'est pas ce que tu as suggéré, mais c'est tout ce que j'ai pu faire.

original: All we can do is hope.
translated: Tout ce que nous pouvons faire, c'est espérer.

original: I haven't seen my family since 2013.
translated: Je n'ai pas vu ma famille depuis 2013.

original: I refused to believe it.
translated: Je me suis refusé à le croire.

original: A whale is no more a fish than a horse is.
translated: Une baleine n'est pas plus un poisson qu'un cheval.

original: There are not enough hours in the day.
translated: Il n'y a pas assez d'heures dans la journée.

original: I knew somebody would come.
translated: Je savais que quelqu'un serait venu.

original: He picked up the rifle and aimed it at the target.
translated: Il a pris le fusil puis a visé la cible.

original: You'll need this more than I do.
translated: Vous en aurez plus besoin que moi.
